remarks: Produce a real limit from an integer limit, where the real function is only dependent on the integer part of ` x ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
statement:
climrlim2.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climrlim2.2 $e |- ( n = ( |_ ` x ) -> B = C ) $.
climrlim2.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
climrlim2.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climrlim2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( n e. Z |-> B ) ~~> D ) $.
climrlim2.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) $.
climrlim2.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> M <_ x ) $.
climrlim2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) ~~>r D ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C n $.
$d D x $.
$d Z n x $.
$d n ph x $.
